data.title: Province Dajabon, Dominican Republic
data.meta_description: Province Dajabon Localisation : Country Dominican Republic, Province Dajabon. Major cities : Dajabón, Loma de Cabrera, Partido, El Pino and Restauración. Available Information : Population, Altitude, Area, Climate and Hotel. - City, Town and Village of the world
data.text:
Punta Rucia Lodge

Punta Rucia

Located right on the beachfront, Punta Rucia Lodge offers an infinity pool, tropical gardens and stylish air-conditioned bungalows with terraces overlooking the ocean... view morefrom

$US 213Via Emilia B&B Restaurante

Santiago de los Caballeros

Via Emilia B&B Restaurante is located a 5-minute walk from the Leon Cultural Museum, in Santiago de los Caballeros. It has a bar-restaurant, a garden terrace and free Wi-Fi... view morefrom

$US 25Hotel Matum

Santiago de los Caballeros

This hotel is located near the city centre of Santiago and features free Wi-Fi and an on-site casino. Hotel Matum offers dry cleaning services and free parking... view morefrom

$US 54Casa del Sol Hotel Luperon

Las Marras

Located 15 minutes’ walk from Luperon Bay Beach and 750 metres from the local market, Casa del Sol Hotel Luperon features a garden, free Wi-Fi and a snack bar. The rooms offer tropical-style décor, wooden furniture and cable TV... view morefrom
